citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
3 snowshoe hares were used for procedures on an expired protocol between 2021 and 2023. The investigator self
reported to the IACUC January 2024, proposed a corrective plan of action and submitted the protocol for approval, which
was granted in February 2024. Animal manipulations of regulated species require review and approval by the IACUC at
no more than 3 year intervals to ensure that animal use is justified and animal welfare impact is minimized. The facility
must ensure that animal use occurs only on approved protocols within the 3 year term of approval.
Corrected in February, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(d)(5) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
3 snowshoe hares were used for procedures on an expired protocol between 2021 and 2023. The investigator self 
reported to the IACUC January 2024, proposed a corrective plan of action and submitted the protocol for approval, which 
was granted in February 2024. Animal manipulations of regulated species require review and approval by the IACUC at 
no more than 3 year intervals to ensure that animal use is justified and animal welfare impact is minimized. The facility 
must ensure that animal use occurs only on approved protocols within the 3 year term of approval. 
Corrected in February, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
